title: Ukraine Clinches Bond-Conversion Deal With Warrant Holders
description: Ukraine and a group of investors have reached an agreement on the country’s proposal to swap as much as $3.2 billion of its economic growth-linked securities into a new class of bonds.
content: Ukraine and a group of investors have reached an agreement on the country’s proposal to swap as much as $3.2 billion of its economic growth-linked securities into a new class of bonds.
